articles.title: Live news: Jes Staley loses bid to sever case from other Epstein claims - Financial Times
articles.content: Jes Staley, the former JPMorgan executive who is being sued by the bank for allegedly failing to disclose that he witnessed and participated in Jeffery Epsteins sex crimes, has lost his bid to sever … [+626 chars]

articles.author: Kana Inagaki
articles.title: Yen slides as new Bank of Japan governor sticks to ultra-loose policy - Financial Times
articles.description: Kazuo Ueda says negative interest rates and yield curve control remain appropriate for now
articles.content:
The yen fell on Monday after new Bank of Japan governor Kazuo Ueda signalled he would for the time being stick to the ultra-loose monetary policy overseen by his predecessor over the past decade.
